XIII.i.3.H.2.a
.
Requests for Information Regarding CHAMPVA Eligibility
If the Veterans Health Administrationâ€™s Health Administration Center (HAC) requires information to determine the eligibility of a claimant for CHAMPVA that it cannot obtain from Share or the Veterans Benefits Management System, HAC e-mails a request for the information to the appropriate regional office (RO).
title: M21-1, Part XIII, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section H - Civilian Health and Medical Program of the Department of Veterans Affairs (CHAMPVA) Eligibility Determinations
citation: Part XIII, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section H
